reviewText: I had to buy this after seeing one of the Neverending Story movies on tv. It is surely a kid's movie but most of them provide entertainment for adults also. This one is on the borderline. It is a fun and entertaining movie.

reviewText: This completed my DVD collection for the Neverending Story film, which I consider a Puff the Magic Dragon meets Harry Potter. It was a bonus to get another movie at such a good price.

reviewText: Not as good as the original. A wrinkle in time has been seen by my grandchildren and they seemed to have liked it.

reviewText: Neverending Story, a title that in and of itself virtually guarantees endless sequels, was great, a true classic.  Neverending Story 2 not so much;  Neverending Story 3 is crap.  The only positive thing I can say about it is that it's the last sequel (as of April 2011).A Wrinkle in Time I have not seen but if it's packaged with Neverending Story 3 I would have low expectations.  Caveat emptor.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I have not watched this movie yet,but if the story line is anything like 1 and 2 I do not know if I want to watch it. Maybe my Granddaughters will enjoy the movies as I didn't much. However i did really enjoy the in neverending story 1.
